org.apache.flink.streaming.api.operators

类 StreamingRuntimeContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.util.AbstractRuntimeUDFContext
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.operators.StreamingRuntimeContext
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RuntimeContext

    @PublicEvolving
public class StreamingRuntimeContext
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.util.AbstractRuntimeUDFContext
    Implementation of the RuntimeContext, for streaming operators.

      • getInputSplitProvider

        public org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.tasks.InputSplitProvider getInputSplitProvider()

      • registerTimer

        public ScheduledFuture<?> registerTimer(long time,
                                        Triggerable target)
        Register a timer callback. At the specified time the Triggerable will be invoked. This call is guaranteed to not happen concurrently with method calls on the operator.
        参数:
        time - The absolute time in milliseconds.
        target - The target to be triggered.

      • getCurrentProcessingTime

        Returns the current processing time as defined by the task's TimeServiceProvider
